body:
I'll give a quick rundown of who I am and then you guys can ask me questions :)

So I am StaticFaultz (otherwise known as "Coby" [irl name]), and I've been playing Minecraft for around 3 or so years. I am nearing 13 years of age and it's been fun so far, playing Minecraft. The most notable server I've joined so far is the Overcast Network. No, I did not come from the Overcast Network because I was demoted or banned or anything. I just wanted to try out Avicus (its been nice so far). Speaking of demotion, I am actually a moderator on the Overcast Network.

Some of the things I do outside Overcast, Avicus, and Minecraft in general include photography, graphic designing, tiny bit of coding (still on the simple HTML5 stage), swimming (recreationally because I have a public pool nearby) and hiking. I live in Hawaii (more specifically, Oahu).

replies.body:
Hey Welcome!
Would you rather be a fish or a pie and why?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Welcome!
Would you rather be a fish or a pie and why?

replies.body: Awkward comparison, but I'd rather be a fish because of its' "liveliness". You get eaten as a pie. Fish do get eaten, but you die first. Pies don't even live.

replies.body: What got you into graphic design and photography?
replies.body_tagged: What got you into graphic design and photography?

replies.body:
@Thecalined: Frontline (offensive defense). I played for Wolves in Quebec on Overcast, and it was essentially my job. I start up skybridges, knock out opponents before they get to my teams' objectives.

@_CubeRoot: I had art as an elective period/class during 7th grade. Since it was a lot better than my previous schools' art classes, I was inspired to do stuff on my own with what they taught me.
replies.body_tagged:
